values:
The time has come to move on. All entries on this journal have been moved to Dreamwidth and purged from this one. I doubt I will use my journal over at Dreamwidth a lot, but it's there just in case. I will be keeping this account open so I can still read all my friends' journals, but just know that I will no longer be updating here. Other places you can find me: Blog - jinked.net Social - iamfiction.net Facebook - Nichole Tumblr - iamfiction Twitter - @iamfiction It's been a blast guys. Please keep in touch.

May 2004 - October 2010
